parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the stance of the given unit. It can be one of: 
* <tt>"STAND"</tt>
* <tt>"CROUCH"</tt>
* <tt>"PRONE"</tt>
* <tt>"UNDEFINED"</tt> (for example, swimming)
* <tt>""</tt> (on non-person [[Object|object]])

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''stance''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[stance]] [[player]] == "STAND") [[then]] {[[hint]] "I am standing!"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[animationState]], [[unitPos]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
